item.title: A Quicksilver Chanukah: Day 1
item.description: I started this year with a blog post about the state of Quicksilver where I set a goal for myself: get web support for important game development crates upstreamed. At the end of the year, I’m happy to update this work (by me and many others!) has been a success, and the core of Rust’s game ecosystem is now-web enabled. In the future, I want to write a brief overview of those changes, but for now I want to focus on their relevance to Quicksilver.
